biztrip.title: CIMB Biztrip
biztrip.description: CIMB internal application for airplane ticket and hotel reservations integrated with Traveloka, used for official travel without using employee's personal funds and supporting petty cash requests.
biztrip.long_description: CIMB internal application for airplane ticket and hotel reservations integrated with Traveloka. This application is specifically used for official travel, so all transactions are conducted directly through the company system without using employee personal funds. In addition, this application also supports petty cash requests and centralized management of official travel needs with complete documentation.
features: Integration of airplane ticket and hotel reservation with Traveloka
Official travel transactions without using employee personal funds
Centralized petty cash request and management
Recording and monitoring official travel for administrative and audit purposes

cash_management.title: LAJU by Mandiri
cash_management.description: Web-based application for ordering and monitoring cash delivery and pickup services for wholesale corporate customers of the company.
cash_management.long_description: Developing an internet-based enterprise application that enables wholesale segment companies to securely and integrally order Cash Pick Up and Delivery service. This system provides convenience in the ordering process, real-time service status monitoring, as well as access to historical transaction data through a secure connection network to support operational needs and audit requirements.
features: Online cash delivery and pickup service ordering
Real-time Cash Pick Up and Delivery service status monitoring
Access to transaction history data for reporting and audit needs
Data security and encrypted connections for enterprise transactions

super_app.title: KOPRA by Mandiri
super_app.description: Web-based application integrated with the Kopra by Mandiri platform supporting ordering and monitoring Cash Pick Up and Delivery services for wholesale corporate customers.
super_app.long_description: Enterprise web application integrated with the Kopra by Mandiri platform, designed to meet the needs of wholesale corporate customers in securely, efficiently, and standardized ordering of Cash Pick Up and Delivery services. This solution enables companies to manage ordering processes, monitor service status in real-time, and access transaction history data through Kopra's security infrastructure to support business operational smoothness, financial reporting, and audit needs.
features: Cash Pick Up and Delivery service orders integrated with Kopra by Mandiri platform
Real-time service status monitoring through Kopra dashboard
Access to transaction history and reports for operational and audit purposes
Data security and encrypted connections according to Kopra by Mandiri enterprise security standards

ifg.title: IFG Life Space
ifg.description: Digital IFG Life Space platform providing integrated services for information management, services, and insurance interactions for IFG Life customers and partners.
ifg.long_description: IFG Life Space is an enterprise digital platform developed by IFG Life to support an integrated insurance service ecosystem. The platform enables customers, partners, and internal company to access policy information, administrative services, and supporting insurance activities securely and centrally. IFG Life Space is designed to improve operational efficiency, service transparency, and user experience quality through a reliable digital system consistent with insurance company governance standards.
features: Centralized access to policy information and insurance services
Service management and monitoring digitally
Service integration within IFG Life ecosystem
Data security and access according to enterprise standards and insurance industry regulations

tembuni.title: Tembuni Birth Center
tembuni.description: Tembuni Birth Center is a professional birth clinic service with gentle birth approach providing comfortable and safe delivery experience for mothers and babies.
tembuni.long_description: Tembuni Birth Center is a healthcare clinic focused on normal delivery services with gentle birth approach and comprehensive support for pregnant women, delivery, and newborn babies. With delivery room atmosphere designed as comfortably as home and as safely as hospital, Tembuni provides holistic care, including prenatal classes, obstetrics & lactation consultation, and child services. This service is designed to improve comfort, safety, and well-being of mother and baby throughout pregnancy, delivery, and postpartum periods. The clinic environment supports family involvement and focuses on early breastfeeding initiation (IMD) and parent-child bonding.
features: Normal delivery with gentle birth approach with minimal medical intervention
Pregnancy exercise classes and prenatal yoga for delivery preparation
Doctor consultation for Obstetrics & Gynecology, lactation, and pediatrics
Homecare and newborn care after delivery
Complete polyclinic facilities including pharmacy and laboratory

accurate.title: PT Accurate Medica Solutions
accurate.description: PT Accurate Medica Solutions is a high-quality and innovative medical equipment distribution company providing health device solutions for medical professional needs and healthcare institutions.
accurate.long_description: PT Accurate Medica Solutions is a company focused on distribution and provision of leading medical equipment in Indonesia. Founded to meet the needs of healthcare professionals and medical institutions for reliable medical devices, the company brings various important medical products such as perforators, dura patches, speedy flaps, cranial fixation systems, and other surgical tools designed to support medical procedures with high precision and safety. Accurate Medica Solutions is committed to product quality and service to strengthen healthcare services and improve patient care outcomes.
features: Distribution of various high-quality medical equipment for hospitals and clinics
Surgical and neurosurgical products such as perforators, dura patches, and cranial fixation systems
Innovative health device solutions supporting clinical and medical operational procedures
Commitment to professional customer service and high-standard technical support
